resources.string: On a sunny day, Xiao Ming goes to the beach to swim, he likes swimming very much

It takes four hours to take the high-speed train from Shenzhen to Changsha. Shenzhen is high-speed train station is Shenzhen North, Changsha is high-speed train station is Changsha South, and Xiao Ming is in Shenzhen preparing to go to Changsha.
How long does it take Xiao Ming to go to Changsha by high-speed rail
